product_overview: AQUA-AI is an AI-powered water quality monitoring platform focused on real-time environmental intelligence across India. It integrates government data sources, provides interactive geographical visualizations, AI-driven predictive analytics, and delivers public health alerts to protect water safety for over a billion people.
core_goals: Enable real-time monitoring and visualization of water quality across Indian water bodies
Provide accurate risk level assessments with color-coded alerts to inform public safety
Leverage machine learning to forecast pollution events and identify hotspots
Integrate and standardize official government water quality datasets for comprehensive coverage
Deliver actionable public health advisories and alerts through multiple channels
Ensure accessibility through a mobile-responsive, user-friendly interface
Support secure user authentication and profile management for personalized experience
key_features: Real-time Water Quality Monitoring Dashboard with interactive map and filters
Risk Level Assessment with color-coded safety indicators (Safe, Medium, High, Critical)
Historical Trend Analysis and pattern recognition of water quality parameters
AI-Powered Pollution Event Forecasting with confidence scores
Public Health Alerts with threshold violation detection and escalation notifications
User Authentication API supporting registration, login, profile retrieval and update
Locations API managing monitoring locations data and supporting geojson format for map rendering
Alerts API providing alert management, including active alerts, resolution, dismissal, and statistics
Comprehensive Integration with Government APIs for data ingestion and normalization
Mobile-Responsive React frontend paired with Node.js/Express backend and Python ML services
Secure JWT-based authentication and input validation with rate limiting and logging
user_flow_summary: User registers or logs into the platform using Auth API and receives JWT token
User accesses the interactive map showing water bodies and quality readings with filtering options
User clicks on location markers to view detailed water quality data and historical trends
User receives real-time risk level updates color-coded by severity on the map and dashboard
System triggers AI models to predict potential pollution events and alerts users accordingly
User can view, resolve, or dismiss alerts through Alerts API endpoints
User can search and view detailed monitoring locations using Locations API
Admins and users can update their profiles securely using authenticated API endpoints
validation_criteria: All API endpoints respond with correct data formats and appropriate HTTP status codes
User authentication adheres to JWT standards with secure password hashing
Real-time data updates reflect accurately in the frontend dashboard within a 15-minute window
AI/ML predictions match expected model performance metrics and confidence levels
Alerts trigger correctly on threshold violations with proper severity classification
Frontend UI is fully responsive and accessible across devices and browsers
Integration with official government data sources updates consistently with no data loss
Database queries return paginated, filtered, and sorted results as specified
Security measures including rate limiting, CORS, and logging are implemented and tested
